copy.hello: Hello! Welcome to the newest version of the CASH platform. Thanks for signing up!
copy.platform_1: The platform works by connecting your own storage, payment, and mailing list accounts with our tools. To set up connections to your services, open the
copy.platform_3: , click 'Connections', and choose the type of account you'd like to connect.
copy.platform_6: . Campaigns are there to help you organize your digital workflow. You can add or edit elements here as well as keep track of how they are doing. A campaign can be easily published as one single page on our hosted site. You can also embed any of the elements of a campaign around the web with a simple cut/paste.
copy.platform_7: Show me what's new in this version.
